title: Fallen angel
html:
Fallen angel

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
& fallen angel
Difficulty 20
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical, Weapon 1d6 physical, Claw 1d4 physical, Cast 2d6 magic missiles
& fallen angel
Difficulty 20
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical, Weapon 1d6 physical, Claw 1d4 physical, Cast 2d6 magic missiles

Base level 14
Base experience 505
Speed 10
Base AC −14
Base MR 55
Alignment 12 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances cold, sleep, shock, poison

A fallen angel:

  • can fly.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.
  • gives out radius-1 light.

The fallen angel is a monster added in dNetHack.

Its attacks and stats are nearly identical to those of the un-fallen angel. The fallen angel, however, can be found in Gehennom.

Encyclopedia entry

Lucifer rebelled.

The angels fell.

We have only the tales of mortals to guide us on this. We,
the heirs of angels, must piece together our heritage from
the scraps of myth. We can surmise that some divine force
exiled Lucifer and his followers. We use their word, God,
because it is a convenient shorthand for our unknown
enemy. The demon race was bred to overthrow this enemy and
take its throne and whatever else we forget, we should
never forget that destiny. A full third of the Host fell,
according to some accounts. For their sins  for pride,
for rebellion, for desiring to be like God, for unknowable
and ineffable reasons  they were banished and they fell.
[ Infernum, Book of the Tormentor, by Gareth Hanrahan ]

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Fallen_angel&oldid=127888"

The '''fallen angel''' is a monster added in [[dNetHack]].  

Its attacks and stats are nearly identical to those of the un-fallen [[angel]]. The fallen angel, however, can be found in [[Gehennom]].
